messages.title: A PLAN TO PROTECT OUR NHS
messages.content:
- 1,000 more nurses
- Reduce cancer waiting times
- £100m Frontline Fund targeting A&E

keyPolicies.policyDescription: A plan to protect our NHS, including hiring 1,000 more nurses, reducing cancer waiting times, and establishing a £100m Frontline Fund targeting A&E departments.

issues.health: A plan to protect our NHS, including hiring 1,000 more nurses, reducing cancer waiting times, and establishing a £100m Frontline Fund targeting A&E departments.

endorsements.endorsement: Our NHS needs real change. I'll be voting Scottish Labour on 7 May because they're the only party who can get rid of the Tories and pull our NHS back from the brink.
I'm supporting Scottish Labour because I know they will invest in and protect our NHS and the frontline services my family relies on.

images.caption: A PLAN TO PROTECT OUR NHS
